column4: It's all subjective, isn't it.  I mean, I don't like it because I prefer using a mouse to the keyboard to navigate to stuff.
if so, then why don't you switch to another Desktop Environment? LXDE suits me fine and can be controlled with keyboard or mouse
why should I assume that you use anything specific? I'm just reacting to your preference for a mouse-controlled Desktop.
yes that distro is really stable, if a bit barebones.
